description: nova.compute.api should return Aggregate Objects, and they should be converted into the REST API expected results in the aggregates API extensions.
title: nova.compute.api should return Objects

comments.content: nova.compute.api should return a List object, and that List should be converted into the REST API expected results in the aggregates API extensions.
